data.description: Report amount of memory a variable uses
data.communities: Report amount of memory a variable uses
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will run through perl's internals and figure out how
    much memory any variable you might have takes. It will, if asked,
    walk multidimensional data structures and report the total amount of
    memory the whole thing takes. (If, for example, you're curious about
    how much memory that XML tree really uses...)
